firstPage.title: You have 1 special ticket

firstPage.tooltipTicketText: Tickets are used to make donations and you get a new one everyday when you log in Ribon.

secondPage.title: Here at Ribon, everything revolves around doing good!
secondPage.subtitle: Donation tickets give you that power, and you've just received your first one!

thirdPage.title: Before donating your ticket, here's a quick summary...
thirdPage.cardDescription1: Real money, but it's exclusively valid for donations to social projects within Ribon.
thirdPage.cardDescription2: Companies, big donors, and members of the Ribon community fund the tickets with one goal in mind: to change lives for the better through the collective power of donation.
thirdPage.cardDescription3: You earn and accumulate tickets by accessing the app daily.

instruction1.title: Choose an action to be rewarded
instruction1.description: Think of an action that your customers already do in your company's site or app that you'd like to incentivize by offering donation tickets.

instruction2.title: Add your link to your product
instruction2.description: Choose where to add your link so your customers can access it. You can add it to a button, share it via email ou through a banner on your platform. The choice is yours to make!
